Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka and West Indies will lock horns in the 2nd ODI of West Indies tour of Sri Lanka 2024 on Wednesday, 23 October 2024, at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, Dambulla.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch is expected to be batting-friendly with an average 1st innings score of 270.
Others: The best Dream11 team for today's match includes Charith Asalanka as captain, Roston Chase as vice-captain, Kusal Mendis and Nishan Madushka as wicketkeepers, Charith Asalanka, Sherfane Rutherford, and Keacy Carty as batters, Wanindu Hasaranga, Roston Chase, and Kamindu Mendis as all-rounders, and Alzarri Joseph, Gudakesh Motie, and Jeffrey Vandersay as bowlers.
